name: Magic Ali - Jump Up
description:
Like jumping? Great, jump in.

In Magic Ali - Jump Up, you play as Ali a little magical girl who is discovering her powers and needs to train to control the properly.

Help her by jumping on platforms and pushing enemies, while collecting mana orbs that will help her reach her goal of perfecting her magic.

You can get playing quickly and as long as you want, the platforms will not stop coming in, so you can keep jumping and collecting.
